title: List of diplomatic missions of Taiwan
summary: Taiwan, officially the Republic of China, has 113 diplomatic missions across the world as of NovemberÂ 2021.[lower-alpha 1] Due to the One-China policy, countries are only allowed to maintain relations with either Taiwan or the mainland-based People's Republic of China.[5]  As most countries have changed their recognition to the latter over time, only 17 of Taiwan's diplomatic missions have official status, consisting of fifteen embassies and two consulate-generals.[2] This makes Taiwan one of the few countries in the world that has resident embassies in all of the states with which it has formal diplomatic relations.[6]
